name: Irvan Hari Saputra - electronics engineering student
description: I am a student at Semarang State Polytechnic, majoring in Electrical Engineering and currently taking a Diploma Three Program in Electronic Engineering. This year is my final semester and I am currently focusing on completing my final assignment. Proficient in creating or understanding electronic circuits, Arduino software programs and programmable logic control (PLC). Committed to continuing to learn about electrical science, industrial automation and the internet of things, and willing to learn new knowledge that is not taught on campus. Trying to utilize the knowledge possessed in the field of electronics and the enthusiasm to continue learning new things and always ready to contribute actively in every opportunity that exists.
